title: Himi 562
lyrics:
8 & 7
(Ko Livitiko 25)
1.
Hiva ē ‘a e ‘ofa lahi
Hota Koeli ‘i mu’a;
Naʻa Ne hifo ki māmani
Ke huhu’i ‘a e pōpula.
‘Ofa ē ka ko ha ʻofa
Ne Ne fai ‘i he ‘Akau
Sīsū na’a Ne mate noa
Ke huhu’i ‘a koe mo au.
2.
Kuo puke ‘e he fili,
‘O ta hopoate pē;
Ha’i sēini, pea kīi’i:
‘Ikai lava hota vete.
‘Ofa ē, etc.
3.
Angahala pe kitaua,
Lahi fau ‘a ‘eta hia;
Kuo hulu ‘a e mo’ua,
‘Ikai paʻanga ‘aki ia.
‘Ofa ē, etc.
4.
Kuo mole ‘a e tofi’a,
Hota ‘api ‘i he langi:
Toe fakatau ‘e Ia,
‘O ne ‘ofa’aki mai.
‘Ofa ē, etc.
5.
Mālō fau he fie nonofo
Hoto Koeli mo au:
Fakatupu hoto loto
Ngaahi me’a lelei mo taau.
‘Ofa ē, etc.*
